Cell.Data: This contains original text meant for subtitles. This text exists for a multi-lingual reference and is not used in-game. Use ## for a new line.
Contains translated text for subtitles. Typically, Original Text is the English version of the Key for reference, while the Translated Text will be what's actually used in-game.

Collect 2 thatch from large bushes to craft rags.\nEquipment->Components
Collect 2 thatch from large bushes to craft rags.\nEquipment->Components
Use 4 rags to craft a rope.\nEquipment->Components
Use 4 rags to craft a rope.\nEquipment->Components
A rock can be found by looking down while standing on rocky terrain.
A rock can be found by looking down while standing on rocky terrain.
Use sticks, rope, and a rock to craft a Hatchet.\nEquipment->Tools

On a consumable item, use its context menu to see if it's safe to consume.
